name: retell
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to tell someone about something again: The story has been retold many times. Retelling traumatic events can stir up negative emotions.
to tell someone a joke that someone has told you, or to repeat a joke you have already told before: It's better to produce new material than to retell old jokes.
